mean_cn: adv.更远地；  adj.更进一步的
mean_en: (comparative of far) at or to a greater distance; to a greater degree or extent
sentence: The ambitious worker wants to go further in his career and eventually become a manager.
sentence_trans: 他总是想在事业方面更上一层楼，最后当上总经理。
word_etyma: furth=forth向前，向前方 + er比较级 → 更前面的 → further更远的
